component.name: Shrew Soft VPN Access Manager
component.summary: Application to manage remote site configurations

description.p: The Shrew Soft VPN Access Manager, also known as qikea, is an application to manage site configuration. You can import, export or edit ovpn files and communicate with iked daemon in order to connect with your sites

Warning: qikea is just a frontend for managing connections, not a vpn client! Qikea uses iked as daemon to manage tun interfaces and you will need running iked and qikea both on your computer. Get iked on DockerHub at: https://hub.docker.com/r/beardoverflow/ike
Disclaimer: This wrapper is not verified by, affiliated with, or supported by Shrew Soft, Inc.
